    • Constructor Detail

      • GrowingSelfOrganizingMap

        public GrowingSelfOrganizingMap(int inputDimension,
                        int numberOfIterations,
                        double ETA,
                        double spreadFactor,
                        double radius,
                        java.lang.String inputVectors,
                        DisplayLattice screen)
        Parameters:
        inputDimension - as the number of dimensions
        ETA - as the learing rate
        spreadFactor - as the desired level of spread of the resulting GSOM
        radius - as the neighbourhood radius
        screen - as the JPanel instance This method initializes all the variables in the GSOM and initilizes the basic structure of the GSOM. This method also initilizes the number pole object which keeps all the references to the GSOMNodes.

    • Method Detail

      • initGrowthThreshold

        private void initGrowthThreshold(double spreadFactor,
                       int inputDimension)
        Parameters:
        spreadFactor - as the desired level of spread of the resulting GSOM
        inputDimension - as the number of dimensions Called by the method #GrowingSelfOrganizingMap(int, double, double, double, DisplayLattice) to initialize the growth threshold which decides whether a node grows or not. The value is calculated according the standard function provided with the algorithm which is GT = -D*ln(SF)

      • initGSOM

        private void initGSOM()
        Called by the method #GrowingSelfOrganizingMap(int, double, double, double, DisplayLattice) to initialize the structure of the GSOM with initial four node structures. This created the GSOMNodes with all the initial relationships. The NumberPole object too initialized to keep reference of each GSOMNode created.

      • addToNumberPole

        private void addToNumberPole(GSOMNode node)
        Parameters:
        node - as the new GSOMNode to be added Add the new node to the NumberPole object according to its X and Y location for further referencing.

      • trainGSOM

        private void trainGSOM(java.lang.String input)
        Parameters:
        input - as the input string Completes a single iteration of the GSOM process. This is different from the SOM learning process since all the inputs are not presented in a single iteration. A single input is put to the complete number of iterations and then set back to the intial values for the next new input.

      • calculateGrowthError

        private void calculateGrowthError(GSOMNode winner,
                        org.apache.commons.math3.linear.ArrayRealVector inputVector)
        Parameters:
        winner - as the winning GSOMNode Calculates the growth error of the GSOMNode. If the accumulated error is greater than the growth threshold value this method will trigger node growth and adjust the highest error of the network if it is greater than the previously observed network error.

      • calculateGrowthErrorPropergation

        private void calculateGrowthErrorPropergation(GSOMNode[] neighbours)
        Parameters:
        neighbours - This method will be triggered with growNodes(GSOMNode) when a non boundary node is selected as the winner and it will be called recursively subsequently if it triggers growth in a non-boundary node.

      • growNodes

        private void growNodes(GSOMNode winner)
        Parameters:
        winner - as the winning GSOMNode Grows nodes according to the structure and the placement of the winner node.

      • setWeightsOfNewNode

        private void setWeightsOfNewNode(GSOMNode newNode,
                       GSOMNode winner,
                       boolean isLeft,
                       boolean isRight,
                       boolean isUp,
                       boolean isDown)
        Parameters:
        newNode - as the newly inserted GSOMNode
        winner - as the winner node of the GSOM
        isLeft - the new node is the left of the winner
        isRight - the new node is the right of the winner
        isUp - the new node is placed above the winner
        isDown - the new node is placed below the winner This method is called by growNodes(GSOMNode) when a new node is created. The weights of the node is adjusted by the classical four cases of the GSOM.
